description: The state event to remember RIC officers will not take place "as planned" following controversy.
title: Irish government 'defers' RIC police commemoration
title_page: Irish government 'defers' RIC police commemoration - BBC News
maintext: "As a next step, I will consult further with the expert Advisory Group on Centenary Commemoration, with the all-party consultative group on commemoration and with other stakeholders, with a view to organising an event that is inclusive and fully respectful of all the traditions and memories on this island," his statement said.
